title: Still got a leave penalty on my account after 3 years of not playing
body: I think it's ridiculous for a returning player to still have this penalty after like 3 years. I left a few matches years ago and now i haven't been able to find any matches :(

replies.body: I've got this account pulled up now, and it doesn't look like this one has any kind of punishments at the moment. If you had a low-priority queue, the only way to get rid of it is to play through the required number of matches.
How frequently do you purge the games and chat logs? Do you still even have information from back then?
